  • Field Details

    • instructionOpcode

      Map<String,String> instructionOpcode
      A mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding opcodes. Key: Assembly instruction Value: Opcode

    • instructionFunction

      Map<String,String> instructionFunction
      A mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding function codes. Key: Assembly instruction Value: Function code

    • instructionType

      Map<String,InstructionsOperations.InstructionType> instructionType
      A mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding instruction types. Key: Assembly instruction Value: Instruction type

    • registerString

      Map<Integer,String> registerString
      A mapping of register names to their corresponding register numbers. Key: Register name Value: Register number

    • integerOpcode

      Map<String,Integer> integerOpcode
      A mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding integer opcodes. Key: Assembly instruction Value: Integer opcode

  • Constructor Details

    • InstructionsOperations

      public InstructionsOperations()
      Constructs a new InstructionsOperations object. Initializes the mappings for opcodes, function codes, instruction types, register names, and integer opcodes. This constructor initializes the object with default values for each mapping.

  • Method Details

    • initializeRegisters

      private void initializeRegisters()
      Initializes the mapping of register names to their corresponding binary representations. This method populates the registerString map with register numbers as keys and their corresponding binary representations as values.

    • initializeOpcodes

      private void initializeOpcodes()
      Initializes the mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding opcodes. This method populates the instructionOpcode map with assembly instructions as keys and their corresponding opcodes as values.

    • initializeIntegerOpcodes

      private void initializeIntegerOpcodes()
      Initializes the mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding integer opcodes. This method populates the integerOpcode map with assembly instructions as keys and their corresponding integer opcodes as values.

    • initializeTypes

      private void initializeTypes()
      Initializes the mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding instruction types. This method populates the instructionType map with assembly instructions as keys and their corresponding instruction types as values.

    • initializeFunctions

      private void initializeFunctions()
      Initializes the mapping of assembly instructions to their corresponding function codes. This method populates the instructionFunction map with assembly instructions as keys and their corresponding function codes as values.

    • getInstruction

      public String getInstruction(String instruction) throws SyntaxException
      Retrieves the instruction mnemonic from the given assembly instruction. This method parses the assembly instruction to extract the mnemonic (operation) part. It then verifies the validity of the instruction mnemonic and returns it.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The assembly instruction from which to extract the mnemonic.
      Returns:
      The instruction mnemonic extracted from the given assembly instruction.
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the instruction mnemonic cannot be found or is unknown.

    • getInstructionType

      public InstructionsOperations.InstructionType getInstructionType(String instruction) throws SyntaxException
      Retrieves the instruction type for the given assembly instruction. This method first extracts the instruction mnemonic from the assembly instruction. It then looks up the instruction type based on the mnemonic from the instructionType map.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The assembly instruction for which to determine the instruction type.
      Returns:
      The instruction type of the given assembly instruction.
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the instruction mnemonic cannot be found or is unknown.

    • getOpcode

      public String getOpcode(String instruction) throws SyntaxException
      Retrieves the opcode for the given assembly instruction. This method first extracts the instruction mnemonic from the assembly instruction. It then looks up the opcode based on the mnemonic from the instructionOpcode map.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The assembly instruction for which to retrieve the opcode.
      Returns:
      The opcode corresponding to the given assembly instruction.
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the instruction mnemonic cannot be found or is unknown.

    • getFunction

      public String getFunction(String instruction) throws SyntaxException
      Retrieves the function code for the given assembly instruction. This method first extracts the instruction mnemonic from the assembly instruction. It then looks up the function code based on the mnemonic from the instructionFunction map.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The assembly instruction for which to retrieve the function code.
      Returns:
      The function code corresponding to the given assembly instruction.
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the instruction mnemonic cannot be found or is unknown.

    • getRegister

      public String getRegister(int register)
      Retrieves the binary representation of the specified register. This method looks up the binary representation of the register from the registerString map based on the given register number.
      Parameters:
      register - The register number for which to retrieve the binary representation.
      Returns:
      The binary representation of the specified register.

    • getIntegerOpcode

      public int getIntegerOpcode(String instruction) throws SyntaxException
      Retrieves the integer opcode for the given assembly instruction. This method first extracts the instruction mnemonic from the assembly instruction. It then looks up the integer opcode based on the mnemonic from the integerOpcode map.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The assembly instruction for which to retrieve the integer opcode.
      Returns:
      The integer opcode corresponding to the given assembly instruction.
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the instruction mnemonic cannot be found or is unknown.

    • extractRegisters

      public int[] extractRegisters(String instruction, int n, int currentAddress)
      Extracts registers from the given assembly instruction. This method parses the assembly instruction to extract the specified number of registers. It searches for register patterns in the instruction and extracts the register numbers. The extracted register numbers are returned as an array.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The assembly instruction from which to extract the registers.
      n - The number of registers to extract.
      Returns:
      An array containing the extracted register numbers.
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the specified number of registers cannot be extracted from the instruction.
